evidence.claim: Benefit Recovery Group utilizes AWS cloud services to host their platforms.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for handling health information.
Benefit Recovery Group mentions integration with X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing and claims processing.
They use REST APIs to facilitate communication between their systems and client applications.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare payment recovery utilizing EDI and X12, aligns with API automation needs.
